welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yungay, Chile! Known for its breathtaking landscapes and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to immerse yourself in the charm of our city and create unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay and all that Yungay has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Los Angeles Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a variety of shops and restaurants for travelers to enjoy.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal with a focus on domestic flights and budget airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: One of the newest terminals at Los Angeles Airport, offering a wide range of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal for all international flights, featuring duty-free shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 45 minutes per day. Additional time can be purchased for a fee.
